TopicTitle: Redo the IVA-light of the Mk2 Lander-can

Articles.Content:
Greetings,

short suggestion: please redo the IVA light from the pilotseat of the Mk2 Lander-can. As it is now (since introduced) it renders the navball completely useless because you don't see shtuff on it. The Mk2 Lander-can is a very wonderful cockpit, but this light. ARGH!

To tell you the truth, I've never bothered with using the Mk2 lander can. It's just way too heavy to be useful. It's more than 4 times heavier than the Mk1 can yet has only twice the capacity.

I guess this is just one more reason it is a useless part.
Yeah, I'd prefer a complete redo of the Mk 2 Can so that it has an actual 2.5m diameter, among other things. A little more usefulness could be great as well.
Believe it or not, it's been on the public bug tracker since June 2013. Whether that got transferred to Squads internal one or whether they just don't consider it high enough a priority, who knows.
Based on this, IVA might get an overhaul soon.
